ReceiverThread - Class in MovieCorner.mediator
 
ReceiverThread(ServerConnectionThread, ServerSocket) - Constructor for class MovieCorner.mediator.ReceiverThread
Creates the receiving thread for the server.
Handles receiving packets and uses a reference to the ServerConnectionThread to handle received packets.
